definition: to carry out one's duties perfunctorily/to fulfill one's responsibility
Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with
to skimp on the job/to work half-heartedly/not to take the job seriously
in order to minimally fulfill one's responsibilities/in order to get off the hook

sentences.english: I am sorry that he should be so half-hearted about the important work.
sentences.chinese: 遺憾，他對這項重要工作竟這樣敷衍塞責。

sentences.english: Don't count on a slacker to help.
sentences.chinese: 不要指望一個敷衍塞責的人來幫你。
